properties.entry: SELECT SITTER_NO , SITTER_TITLE , MEM_NAME , RES_NO , RES_DATE , RES_CHECKIN , RES_CHECKOUT , RES_STATUS , CANCEL_REASON , REV_STATUS , FILE_PATH||CHANGE_NAME PATH FROM RESERV RE JOIN REVIEW USING(RES_NO) JOIN RESERV_SITTING USING(RES_NO) JOIN FEE USING(SITTING_NO) JOIN SITTER USING(SITTER_NO) JOIN MEMBER M ON(SITTER_NO = M.MEM_NO) JOIN ATTACHMENT AT ON(SITTER_NO = AT_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL=1 AND AT_CATEGORY='SITTER_PIC' AND AT.STATUS = 'Y' AND RE.MEM_NO = ? AND (RES_CHECKIN between ? and ? or RES_CHECkOUT between ? and ?)

SELECT P.PET_NO , P.MEM_NO , S.SITTER_NO , M.MEM_NAME SITTER_NAME , PET_NAME , PET_BIRTH , SUBSTR(P.PET_SIZE,1,2) PET_SIZE , PET_GENDER , SITTER_CHECKIN , SITTER_CHECKOUT , FEE , PET_IMG FROM PET P JOIN FEE F ON(SUBSTR(P.PET_SIZE,1,2) = F.PET_SIZE) JOIN MEMBER M ON(f.sitter_no=M.MEM_NO) JOIN SITTER S ON(F.SITTER_NO = S.SITTER_NO)
